name: Epyx & Cyrez - Two Against The Void
description:
**This is a very limited CD release. To avoid disappointment please preorder your copy now. The release date for this album is 19/02/13, all preorders will be posted on this date. **

Two Against the Void, by Finnish producers Epyx & Cyrez, is the first full length artist album to be released on Watchtower Records. Having featured on labels as diverse as FINRG, Nu Energy and Electronica Exposed we are very proud to be working with such talented artists. This release consists of 15 DJ friendly tracks covering the darker, deeper sound of Freeform and features remixes from Tyranoid/Strongstream, Endemic and a very special remix by Pain on Creation and Substanced.

We hope you enjoy this release as much as we do.

Everyone that purchases this CD will receive a FREE mix download, mixed by Epyx & Cyrez themselves.

Please visit https://www.facebook.com/EpyxCyrez and https://www.facebook.com/watchtowerhq for more details.

<iframe width="100%" height="600" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="http://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Fplaylists%2F3440323&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true&color=00ccff"></iframe>


**This is a very limited CD release. To avoid disappointment please preorder your copy now.**

name: Watchtower Vol. 2
description:
Watchtower Vol.2 is the second compilation released via Watchtower Records.

Committed to releasing only the highest quality music, this second volume represents the pinnacle of todays Freeform Hardcore.

Watchtower Vol. 2 includes 12 unmixed, DJ friendly tracks from the following artists:

Carbon Based, Lost Soul, Ephexis, Endemic, Grimsoul Re-Form, Transcend, Substanced, Aryx, Qygen, Torpex and pHate and Hyped.

Plus on the bonus mixed CD - CD 2 - we are also pleased to present "Exile" by Ble3k. A rising star in drum and bass, Ble3k represents the sounds of Ammunition Records, a label that consistently pushes the boundaries of Neurofunk DNB.

RELEASE DATE: Nov. 6 2012. Available now!

Additional free tracks by, Endemic, Transcend and Qygen can be downloaded - for free - via the "music" tab at the following address: 
www.facebook.com/watchtowerhq

<iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="http://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Fplaylists%2F2524955&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true&color=00ccff"></iframe>

name: Watchtower Vol. I
description:
WTR001 is the first release from Watchtower records. This double disc, high quality digipak is available now, released worldwide on the 30th January 2012.  

The release includes 10 unmixed DJ & listener friendly tracks and a second mix CD.

Unmixed CD Track Listing:
1 - Endemic - Whispers (Rik Arkitech remix)
2 - Aryx - Solar Flare
3 - Substanced	 - Exodus
4 - Endemic - The Prophet
5 - A.B - Qube
6 - Transcend -Out Of My Head
7 - Douglas - Mycenae
8 - Lost Soul - Aliens In Pyjamas
9 - Qygen - Past Blaster
10 - Proteus - Get Fire!

Plus a full length mixed CD containing all album tracks plus the free download 'Zero-G Fire' by Transcend.

name: Watchtower Tee Shirt
description: High quality fitted tee shirt branded with a central worn effect Watchtower logo. Available in Small, Medium & Large sizes in 4 different colours.
